term.description: The main word or term being learned.

context.description: A sentence or phrase providing context for the term.

type.description: The grammatical category of the term, such as noun, verb, etc.

termTranslation.description: The translation of the term in another language.

contextTranslation.description: The translation of the context sentence.

termAudio.description: Relative URL to the audio file for the term.

termTranslationAudio.description: Relative URL to the audio file for the term translation.

imageCandidates.description: Array of potential image files related to the term (paths relative to flashcards.json).
